name: Metal Slug Memoirs
description:
[Edit: Flash is no longer supported by most browsers]

The art assets do not belong to me (e.g: Plane, Blimp, Krakens, Boss). They all belong to the creators and developers of Metal Slug (there is one asset from Castlevania).

Abilities and Usage:

- Use up, down, left, right keys to move.

- Hold spacebar to shoot.

- While stationary, hold shift to heal and consume Overdrive meter (the blue bar).

- While holding spacebar, hold control to shoot special bullets and consume Overdrive meter.

- When bottom right circle displays "GO!", press enter key to summon an ally.
